docs.title: Welcome to bdomarket
docs.text: bdomarket is a Python package for interacting with the Black Desert Online Market API.

docs.title: Modules
docs.text:
• Market: Core logic for API communication.
  • Identifiers: Enums for regions, API versions, locales, and servers.
  • Response Model: Data classes representing API responses.
  • Utilities: Helper functions and constants.

docs.title: __init__(region=MarketRegion.EU, apiversion=ApiVersion.V2, language=Locale.English)
docs.text:
Initializes the Market object with the specified region, API version, and language.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default region MarketRegion

The region to use for the API requests. Defaults to AvailableRegions.EU.

EU apiversion ApiVersion

The API version to use for the requests. Defaults to AvailableApiVersions.V2.

V2 language Locale

The language to use for the API responses. Defaults to SupportedLanguages.English.

English

docs.title: close()
docs.text: Close the synchronous requests session.

docs.title: get_bidding_info(ids, sids) async
docs.text:
Get orders of an item or list of items

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default ids list[str]

itemid(s)

required sids list[str]

subid(s)

required

Returns:

Name Type Description ApiResponse ApiResponse

standardized response. Response.content: Returns JsonArray of JsonObjects of items' bidding information.

docs.title: get_item(ids=[]) async
docs.text:
Get item information by its id(s).

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default ids list[str]

A list of item ids to retrieve information for. Defaults to an empty list.

[]

Returns:

Name Type Description ApiResponse ApiResponse

standardized response. Response.content: Returns JsonArray of JsonObjects of items with their id, name, and sid.

If no ids are provided, returns an empty ApiResponse.

docs.title: get_item_sync(ids=[])
docs.text:
Get item information by its id(s).

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default ids list[str]

A list of item ids to retrieve information for. Defaults to an empty list.

[]

Returns:

Name Type Description ApiResponse ApiResponse

standardized response. Response.content: Returns JsonArray of JsonObjects of items with their id, name, and sid.

If no ids are provided, returns an empty ApiResponse.

docs.title: get_market() async
docs.text:
Convenience method for getting all items currently available on the market.

Returns:

Name Type Description ApiResponse ApiResponse

standardized response. Response.content: Returns JsonArray of JsonObjects of items currently available on the market.

docs.title: get_market_price_info(ids, sids, convertdate=True, formatprice=False) async
docs.text:
Get price history for an item or list of items. If multiple ids are given, returns a JsonArray of JsonObject of the items' price history. If only one id is given, returns a JsonObject of the item's price history.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default ids List[str]

itemid(s)

required sids List[str]

subid(s) like enhancement level

required convertdate bool

Convert unix-like timestamp to UTC datetime. Defaults to True.

True formatprice bool

Format price, adding separator (,). Defaults to False.

False

Returns:

Name Type Description ApiResponse ApiResponse

standardized response. Returned values in content.history: key (eg. "1745193600000"): Unix timestamps in milliseconds (from utils use ConvertTimestamp), value (eg. 75000000000): item silver value

docs.title: get_market_price_info_sync(ids, sids, convertdate=True, formatprice=False)
docs.text:
Get price history for an item or list of items. If multiple ids are given, returns a JsonArray of JsonObject of the items' price history. If only one id is given, returns a JsonObject of the item's price history.

Parameters:

itemid(s)

Returns:

Name Type Description ApiResponse ApiResponse

standardized response. Returned values in content.history: key (eg. "1745193600000"): Unix timestamps in milliseconds (from utils use ConvertTimestamp), value (eg. 75000000000): item silver value

docs.title: item_database_dump(start_id, end_id, chunk_size=100, showstatus=False) async
docs.text:
Dump the item database from startid to endid in chunks of chunksize.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default start_id int

Start id.

required end_id int

End id.

required chunk_size int

The number of items to fetch in each request. Defaults to 100.

100

Returns:

Name Type Description ApiResponse ApiResponse

standardized response. Response.content: Returns JsonArray of JsonObjects of items with their id, name, and sid.

standardized response. Response.content: Returns JsonArray of JsonObjects of items with their id, name, and sid.

docs.title: bdomarket.identifiers
docs.text:
This module defines enumerations used to standardize references to:

  • API versions
  • Market regions
  • Locales
  • Region-specific identifiers (e.g. PigCave)
  • Server identifiers
  • Item property keys

docs.title: ApiVersion
docs.text: Bases: Enum

docs.title: ItemProp
docs.text: Bases: Enum

docs.title: Locale
docs.text: Bases: Enum

docs.title: MarketRegion
docs.text: Bases: Enum

docs.title: PigCave
docs.text: Bases: Enum

docs.title: Server
docs.text: Bases: Enum

docs.title: __str__()
docs.text:
String representation of the ApiResponse object.

Returns:

Name Type Description str str

A string containing the success status, status code, message, and content of the response.

docs.title: save_to_file(path, mode='w')
docs.text:
Save the ApiResponse content to a file in JSON format.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default path str

The file path where the content should be saved.

required

docs.title: GetTimer()
docs.text:
Get the scraped boss timer data.

Returns:

Name Type Description list list

A list of lists containing the boss timer data, where each sublist contains the time and the bosses.

docs.title: GetTimerJSON(indent=2)
docs.text:
Convert the boss timer data to a JSON string.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default indent int

Number of spaces for JSON indentation. Defaults to 2.

2

Returns:

Name Type Description str str

JSON string of the boss timer data.

docs.title: Scrape()
docs.text:
Scrape the boss timer data from the website.

Returns:

Name Type Description Boss Boss

The instance itself for method chaining.

docs.title: __init__(server=Server.EU)
docs.text:
Initialize a Boss object with a server region.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default server Server

Server region for boss timer data. Defaults to Server.EU.

EU

docs.title: GetIcon(folderpath='icons', isrelative=True, filenameprop=ItemProp.ID)
docs.text:
Download and save the item’s icon to a specified folder.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default folderpath str

Path to save the icon. Defaults to "icons".

'icons' isrelative bool

If True, folderpath is relative to the current file. If False, it’s absolute. Defaults to True.

True filenameprop ItemProp

Use item’s ID or name for the filename. Defaults to ItemProp.ID.

ID

docs.text:

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default id str

Unique identifier for the item. Defaults to "735008".

'735008' name str

Name of the item. Defaults to "".

''
